buttons.Всі продажі з маркою:
SELECT marketing.id, DATE_FORMAT(marketing.date_of_sale, '%d.%m.%Y') AS 'Дата продажу', 
marketing.quantity AS 'Кількість', car.brand AS 'Марка' FROM marketing JOIN car ON marketing.car_id = car.id;

buttons.Продажі американських машин:
SELECT marketing.id, DATE_FORMAT(marketing.date_of_sale, '%d.%m.%Y') AS 'date sale', 
marketing.quantity, car.brand, made_in FROM marketing JOIN car ON marketing.car_id = car.id WHERE made_in='США';
buttons.Продажі німецьких машин:
SELECT marketing.id, DATE_FORMAT(marketing.date_of_sale, '%d.%m.%Y') AS 'date sale', 
marketing.quantity, car.brand, made_in FROM marketing JOIN car ON marketing.car_id = car.id WHERE made_in='Німеччина';
buttons.Продажі українських машин:
SELECT marketing.id, DATE_FORMAT(marketing.date_of_sale, '%d.%m.%Y') AS 'date sale', 
marketing.quantity, car.brand, made_in FROM marketing JOIN car ON marketing.car_id = car.id WHERE made_in='Україна';

buttons.Продажі з маркою машини, ціною та сумою:
SELECT marketing.id, DATE_FORMAT(marketing.date_of_sale, '%d.%m.%Y') AS date_sale, 
marketing.quantity, car.brand, CONCAT(car.price, ' ₴') AS price, CONCAT(car.price*quantity, ' ₴') AS summ FROM marketing JOIN car ON marketing.car_id = car.id;
buttons.Найдешевший автомобіль:
SELECT * FROM car 
WHERE price = (SELECT MIN(price) FROM car);

buttons....по ціні автомобілів:
SELECT * FROM car 
ORDER BY price ASC;
buttons....по кількості авто:
SELECT * FROM car 
ORDER BY amount ASC;

buttons.Пошук BMW: SELECT * FROM car WHERE brand LIKE 'BMW%';
